actual_meaning: ordinary people or common members of a group, not the leaders.
cultural_translation: सामान्य कार्यकर्ते / सामान्य सदस्य

actual_meaning: irregularly, not smoothly, with frequent stops and sudden efforts
cultural_translation: अधूनमधून, तुटकपणे

actual_meaning: a very small amount; just a little
cultural_translation: थोडंसं

actual_meaning: out of danger or difficulty; past the worst part
cultural_translation: धोक्याबाहेर आला/आली आहे

actual_meaning: completely controlled or dominated by someone, usually in a personal or work relationship
cultural_translation: त्याच्या नियंत्रणाखाली / त्याच्या ताब्यात

actual_meaning: extremely worried, frustrated, or confused, not knowing what to do next
cultural_translation: थकल्याशा/असहाय्य अवस्थेत

phrase: Between the devil and the deep sea
actual_meaning: faced with two dangerous or unpleasant options; in a dilemma
cultural_translation: असहाय्य परिस्थितीत / दोन वाईट पर्यायांमध्ये अडकलेला

actual_meaning: to work late into the night, usually studying or working hard
cultural_translation: उशिरापर्यंत मेहनत करणे / काम करणे

actual_meaning: to speak honestly and directly, even if it’s unpleasant
cultural_translation: चुकलं तर थेट सांगणे

actual_meaning: to succeed brilliantly or achieve something with great success
cultural_translation: मोठ्या यशाने पूर्ण करणे / यशस्वी होणे

literal_translation: आशेचा कोणताही आधार नसतानाही आशा करणे
actual_meaning: to continue hoping for something even when it seems very unlikely to happen
cultural_translation: असाही काही तरी होईल अशी आशा ठेवणे

phrase: Hit the nail on the head
actual_meaning: to say or do something exactly right; to describe a situation accurately
cultural_translation: अचूक निदान करणे / योग्य ठिकाणी बोलणे

actual_meaning: having a hidden personal motive, bias, or self-interest behind what one says or does
cultural_translation: स्वार्थी हेतू असणे

actual_meaning: to remove, discard, eliminate, or free oneself from someone or something unwanted
cultural_translation: सुटका करून घेणे

actual_meaning: in a state of open hostility; ready to fight or strongly opposed
cultural_translation: एकमेकांशी उघड शत्रुत्वात असणे

actual_meaning: to waste money or resources recklessly; to spend carelessly
cultural_translation: पैशांची उधळपट्टी करणे

phrase: To take the bull by the horns
actual_meaning: to face a difficult or dangerous situation boldly and directly
cultural_translation: धाडसाने परिस्थितीला सामोरे जाणे

actual_meaning: to rain very heavily
cultural_translation: मुसळधार पाऊस पडणे

actual_meaning: to make every possible effort; to try extremely hard to achieve something
cultural_translation: जिवापाड मेहनत करणे

actual_meaning: without any success; useless; not producing the desired result
cultural_translation: काहीच उपयोग झाला नाही

actual_meaning: to be mistaken; to accuse or pursue the wrong person or idea
cultural_translation: चुकीच्या दिशेने विचार/प्रयत्न करणे

actual_meaning: to prevent someone or something from approaching or causing harm; to hold off
cultural_translation: दूर ठेवणे

phrase: Make a clean breast of it
actual_meaning: to confess fully; to tell the whole truth without hiding anything
cultural_translation: संपूर्ण सत्य कबूल करणे

phrase: Have a card up one’s sleeve
actual_meaning: to have a secret plan, hidden advantage, or something kept in reserve to use later
cultural_translation: गुप्त योजना मनात ठेवलेली असणे

phrase: Like a cat on hot bricks
actual_meaning: very restless, nervous, or unable to stay calm (usually due to anxiety or tension)
cultural_translation: अस्वस्थपणे इकडे-तिकडे फिरणे

actual_meaning: a life full of constant quarrels and conflicts; always fighting
cultural_translation: कधीही न पटणारं सहवासाचं आयुष्य

actual_meaning: a false, exaggerated, or unbelievable story; complete nonsense
cultural_translation: मनगटावरची गोष्ट / खोटी गोष्ट

actual_meaning: to ask for or desire something that is impossible or unattainable
cultural_translation: असंभव गोष्टीची मागणी करणे

actual_meaning: the advantages and disadvantages of something; the positive and negative aspects
cultural_translation: फायदे आणि तोटे

actual_meaning: to be in a difficult, awkward, or challenging situation
cultural_translation: अडचणीत असणे

literal_translation: टी अक्षरावर आडवी रेषा काढा आणि आय अक्षरावर टिंब द्या.
actual_meaning: to pay great attention to detail; to do something very carefully and thoroughly
cultural_translation: काळजीपूर्वक प्रत्येक गोष्ट पूर्ण करणे

actual_meaning: keeping a safe distance from someone or something, either physically or emotionally; avoiding close contact or involvement
cultural_translation: दूर ठेवणे / अंतर ठेवणे

actual_meaning: impossible, not allowed, or not worth considering
cultural_translation: असंभव / विचारण्यासारखे नाही

actual_meaning: Completed or dealt with (a task, problem, or obstacle)
cultural_translation: समस्या मिटली

actual_meaning: do or say something to relieve tension or get conversation going in a strained situation or when strangers meet.
cultural_translation: संवादाची सुरुवात करणे

actual_meaning: Something that is very easy to do
cultural_translation: अगदी सोपं काम / डाव्या हाताचं काम

actual_meaning: Something that happens very rarely
cultural_translation: फार क्वचित / कधी तरीच

actual_meaning: To feel ill or unwell
cultural_translation: तब्येत ठीक नसणे / आजारी वाटणे

actual_meaning: To reveal a secret, often accidentally
cultural_translation: गुपित उघड करणे / सगळं सांगून टाकणे

actual_meaning: To go to bed or go to sleep
cultural_translation: झोपायला जाणे / झोप घ्यायला जाणे

phrase: Cost an arm and a leg
actual_meaning: Something that is extremely expensive
cultural_translation: प्रचंड महाग असणे / फार खर्चिक असणे

actual_meaning: To be extremely happy
cultural_translation: अत्यंत आनंदी असणे / आनंदाच्या शिखरावर असणे

actual_meaning: To be in trouble or facing serious difficulty
cultural_translation: अडचणीत असणे / संकटात सापडणे

phrase: At the drop of a hat
actual_meaning: Immediately; without any warning or delay
cultural_translation: क्षणात / लगेचच / क्षणाचाही विलंब न करता

actual_meaning: To be in a difficult or troublesome situation
cultural_translation: कठीण परिस्थितीत असणे / अडचणीत सापडणे

literal_translation: कधीही नाही करण्यापेक्षा उशिरा केलेले बरे
actual_meaning: It is better to do something late than not do it at all
cultural_translation: उशीर झाला तरी चालेल, पण न केलेल्यापेक्षा केलेलं बरं

phrase: The ball is in your court
actual_meaning: It is now your responsibility to take action or make a decision
cultural_translation: आता निर्णय तुझ्या हातात आहे / पुढची चाल तुझी आहे

phrase: Let the cat out of the bag
actual_meaning: To reveal a secret, often accidentally
cultural_translation: गुपित उघड होणे / चुकून रहस्य बाहेर पडणे

actual_meaning: To face a painful or difficult situation bravely
cultural_translation: कठीण गोष्ट धैर्याने स्वीकारणे / त्रास सहन करून करणे

actual_meaning: To do something in the easiest, quickest, or cheapest way—often by reducing quality or skipping important steps
cultural_translation: शॉर्टकट घेणे / कामात तडजोड करणे

actual_meaning: To return to the starting point after a failure or setback
cultural_translation: पुन्हा सुरुवातीपासून / सगळं नव्याने सुरू करणे

actual_meaning: Over a long period of time; eventually
cultural_translation: दीर्घकाळात / शेवटी पाहता

actual_meaning: To agree or have the same understanding about something
cultural_translation: एकमत असणे / एकाच विचारावर असणे

actual_meaning: Before the expected or scheduled time
cultural_translation: वेळेआधी / ठरलेल्या वेळेच्या आधी

actual_meaning: To do your fair share of work in a group
cultural_translation: आपला वाटा नीट पार पाडणे / जबाबदारी प्रामाणिकपणे निभावणे

actual_meaning: To make extra effort beyond what is required
cultural_translation: अपेक्षेपेक्षा जास्त प्रयत्न करणे / जास्त मेहनत घेणे

actual_meaning: To start an activity, process, or project
cultural_translation: सुरुवात करणे / कामाला चालना देणे

actual_meaning: To do something strictly according to the rules or procedure
cultural_translation: नियमाप्रमाणे / योग्य पद्धतीने

actual_meaning: To be in trouble or facing serious difficulty
cultural_translation: अडचणीत असणे / संकटात सापडणे

actual_meaning: To agree fully or have the same opinion as someone
cultural_translation: एकमत असणे / सहमतीत असणे

actual_meaning: To ignore something intentionally or pretend not to notice
cultural_translation: डोळे मिटून दुर्लक्ष करणे / अनाकलनीयपणे दुर्लक्ष करणे

actual_meaning: To intentionally ignore or be unfriendly to someone
cultural_translation: कुणाला दुर्लक्ष करणे / उपेक्षा करणे

actual_meaning: To accept the consequences of your actions, especially unpleasant ones
cultural_translation: परिणामांना सामोरे जाणे / चुका स्वीकारणे

actual_meaning: To be in a risky or dangerous situation, often one that could get you into trouble
cultural_translation: धोकादायक परिस्थितीत असणे / सावध राहावे लागणारी परिस्थिती

phrase: Wear one’s heart on one’s sleeve
actual_meaning: To openly show your emotions instead of hiding them
cultural_translation: आपली भावना स्पष्टपणे व्यक्त करणे / मन उघडपणे दाखवणे

actual_meaning: To decide something too quickly, without having all the facts
cultural_translation: निष्कर्ष लगेच काढणे / आधी विचार न करता निर्णय घेणे

actual_meaning: To remain silent and avoid saying something, especially to prevent trouble
cultural_translation: बोलण्यावर नियंत्रण ठेवणे / शांत राहणे

actual_meaning: To become angry suddenly or lose control of one’s emotions
cultural_translation: रागावणे / संयम गमावणे

actual_meaning: To watch something or someone carefully
cultural_translation: लक्ष ठेवणे / पाहणे

actual_meaning: To describe something briefly and clearly
cultural_translation: थोडक्यात / संक्षेपात

actual_meaning: A small, visible part of a much larger problem or situation
cultural_translation: केवळ लहानसा भाग दिसणे / मोठ्या समस्येचा केवळ लहानसा भाग

phrase: At the drop of a hat
actual_meaning: Immediately; without any warning or delay
cultural_translation: लगेचच / क्षणात / क्षणाचाही विलंब न करता

actual_meaning: To start a task or project energetically and successfully from the beginning
cultural_translation: त्वरित प्रभावीपणे सुरुवात करणे / लगेच कामात गुंतणे

actual_meaning: To fail spectacularly or disastrously
cultural_translation: मोठ्या अपयशाने अयशस्वी होणे / पराभूत होणे

actual_meaning: To give up or admit defeat
cultural_translation: हार मानणे / प्रयत्न थांबवणे

actual_meaning: To try very hard to help or please someone
cultural_translation: जास्तीत जास्त प्रयत्न करणे / खूप मेहनत घेणे

actual_meaning: To feel uncomfortable or out of place in a particular situation
cultural_translation: अजीब किंवा अस्वस्थ परिस्थितीत असणे / अनुकूल नसलेल्या ठिकाणी असणे

actual_meaning: Something that seems bad at first but turns out to be good
cultural_translation: संकटातून फायदा होणे / सुरुवातीला वाईट दिसणारे पण शेवटी चांगले ठरणे

actual_meaning: To avoid talking about the main topic or issue
cultural_translation: मुद्दा टाळणे / थेट गोष्ट न सांगता गोलमटोल बोलणे

actual_meaning: A way to wish someone good luck, especially before a performance or exam
cultural_translation: शुभेच्छा! / चांगलं कर!

actual_meaning: To destroy relationships or opportunities so that you cannot return to them
cultural_translation: नातेसंबंध तोडून टाकणे / परत येण्याचा मार्ग बंद करणे

actual_meaning: To be upset about something that has already happened and cannot be changed
cultural_translation: झालेल्या गोष्टीवर व्यर्थ पश्चात्ताप करणे

phrase: Every cloud has a silver lining
literal_translation: प्रत्येक संकटात काहीतरी चांगले दडलेले असते.
actual_meaning: Every difficult or bad situation has some positive aspect
cultural_translation: प्रत्येक वाईट गोष्टीत काहीतरी चांगलं असतं

actual_meaning: To study hard, especially for an exam or test
cultural_translation: अभ्यासाला लागणे / जोरात अभ्यास करणे

actual_meaning: Both people involved in a situation are responsible for it
cultural_translation: भांडणात दोघांचीही चूक असते / दोन बाजू जबाबदार असतात

actual_meaning: To try every possible method to achieve something or find something
cultural_translation: कोणतीही कसर न ठेवणे / सर्वतोपरी प्रयत्न करणे

phrase: Not playing with a full deck
actual_meaning: Used to say that someone is behaving in a foolish, strange, or irrational way
cultural_translation: थोडा वेडा वाटणे / नीट शहाणा नसल्यासारखा वागणे

actual_meaning: To be freed from blame, responsibility, or trouble
cultural_translation: जबाबदारीतून सुटणे / संकटातून मुक्त होणे

actual_meaning: To stop or end an activity, project, or system, often suddenly
cultural_translation: थांबवणे / बंद करणे / शेवट करणे

actual_meaning: What you do matters more than what you say
cultural_translation: बोलण्यापेक्षा कृती महत्त्वाची

actual_meaning: Make a bad situation worse
cultural_translation: आगीत तेल ओतणे

actual_meaning: Rushing to finish before a deadline
cultural_translation: वेळेच्या दबावाखाली

actual_meaning: Listening very carefully
cultural_translation: पूर्ण लक्ष देऊन ऐकणे

actual_meaning: In a state of confusion or disorder
cultural_translation: गोंधळलेली अवस्था

actual_meaning: Release stress or anger
cultural_translation: ताण कमी करणे / मन मोकळं करणे

actual_meaning: By any means, fair or unfair
cultural_translation: कसेही करून

actual_meaning: Stop working for the day
cultural_translation: आजसाठी काम थांबवणे

actual_meaning: Get to the main point quickly
cultural_translation: थेट मुद्द्यावर येणे

actual_meaning: Lose confidence before doing something important
cultural_translation: शेवटच्या क्षणी घाबरणे

actual_meaning: Adapt to situations instead of resisting them
cultural_translation: परिस्थितीनुसार वागणे

actual_meaning: फक्त स्वतःचाच फायदा साधून घेणे
cultural_translation: Being selfish or only thinking about oneself.

literal_translation: Make fun of shapes and colors
actual_meaning: बाह्म लक्षणांवरून अंतगथत वागणुकीचे चचत्र स्पष्ट होते.
cultural_translation: One’s outward appearance or gestures often reveal their true nature.

literal_translation: You cannot see your own back.
actual_meaning: स्वतःचे दोष स्वतःला ददसत नाही.
cultural_translation: One cannot see or admit one’s own faults.

actual_meaning: दान नेहमी सत्पात्री करावे.
cultural_translation: Charity is most virtuous when given to a deserving person.

literal_translation: To jump out of the fire and into the frying pan.
actual_meaning: एका संकटातून चनघून दुसऱ्या संकटात सापडणे.
cultural_translation: Getting out of one problem and immediately falling into another.

actual_meaning: आपले रहस्य गुचपत ठेवण्यासाठी दुसऱ्याला चप करणे.
cultural_translation: Using someone else to cover up your own secrets.

literal_translation: One should be prepared to face the consequences.
actual_meaning: तक्रार न करता आलेली पररचस्र्ती स्वीकारणे.
cultural_translation: One should accept difficulties or misfortunes gracefully without complaint.

literal_translation: Already there was joy, and then came the month of Phalgun.
actual_meaning: मुळातच आळशी व्यक्तीस अजून अनुकूल पररचस्र्ती चनमाथण करणे.
cultural_translation: Adding more trouble or temptation to an already lazy or careless person.

actual_meaning: चवचार न करता बोलणे
cultural_translation: Speaking without thinking or caution.

phrase: आपण हसे लोकाला शेंबूड आपल्या नाकाला
literal_translation: We laugh at others, but we have snot on our own nose.
actual_meaning: दुसऱ्याला आपण ज्या दोषाबद्दल हसतो तोच दोष नेमका आपल्याजवळ असणे.
cultural_translation: We laugh at others’ faults while having the same fault ourselves.

literal_translation: My grandfather has become a grandfather.
actual_meaning: एखादे नुकसान झाले असता त्याच वेळी दुसरी फायद्याची गोष्ट होणे.
cultural_translation: When one loss occurs, another gain happens at the same time.

phrase: आंधळा मागतो एक डोळा देव देतो दोन
literal_translation: The blind man asks for one eye, and God gives him two.
actual_meaning: अपेक्षा केली त्यापेक्षा जास्त चमळणे
cultural_translation: Receiving more than what was asked for.

literal_translation: Where there is food, there will be ghosts.
actual_meaning: पैस्यामुळेच चार व्यक्ती आपल्या भोवती असतात.
cultural_translation: Money attracts people.

literal_translation: Excessive eating leads to the grave.
actual_meaning: खाण्याचपण्यात अचतरेक घातक ठरतो.
cultural_translation: Overeating can lead to serious health problems.

phrase: अग अग म्हशी मला कोठे नेशी
literal_translation: Hey, hey buffalo, where are you taking me?
actual_meaning: आपली चूक दुसऱ्याच्या मार्ी मारणे.
cultural_translation: Blaming someone else for your own mistake.

literal_translation: Eating at a free food kitchen and then asking for alms.
actual_meaning: अगोदरच एखादे काम फुकट करून वर चमजास खोरी करणे.
cultural_translation: Asking for extra benefits even after getting something for free.

actual_meaning: अडचणीत सापडनाऱ्याला आणखीच हैराण करणे.
cultural_translation: Troubling or hurting someone even more when they are already in difficulty.

actual_meaning: आपली उन्नती आपल्या कातुथत्वावरच अवलंबून असते.
cultural_translation: One’s success or progress depends on one’s own efforts.

literal_translation: The stars were already there, and then the winds started blowing.
actual_meaning: आधीच मकथट आचण त्यात त्याने मद्यपान करणे.
cultural_translation: Already in a bad condition, and then making it worse by one’s own actions.

phrase: मनी नाही भाव देवा मला पाव
literal_translation: There is no devotion in my heart, yet God, please bless me.
actual_meaning: कमथ न करता फळ मागणे.
cultural_translation: Asking for rewards without putting in any effort.

literal_translation: God is in the temple, but also in the rags.
actual_meaning: एका कामास जाणे पण दुसरेच काम करणे.
cultural_translation: Going for one purpose but doing something else instead.

phrase: कधी गाडीवर नाव तर कधी नावेवर गाडी
literal_translation: Sometimes the name is on the car, sometimes the car is on the name.
actual_meaning: सवाांचेच ददवस येतात समान चस्र्ती कधीच राहत नाही.
cultural_translation: Sometimes one is on top, sometimes one is not — life is never the same all the time.

phrase: कुठे जाशी भोगा तो तर तुझ्यापुढे उभा
literal_translation: Wherever you go, you will face the consequences; it stands right before you.
actual_meaning: नको असलेली संकट समोर येणे.
cultural_translation: No matter where you go, the trouble you want to avoid comes right in front of you.

literal_translation: The crow was about to sit down, and the branch was about to break.
actual_meaning: परस्पर संबंध नसतांना योगायोगाने दोन गोष्टी एकाच वेळी घडणे.
cultural_translation: Two unrelated events happening at the same time by coincidence.

actual_meaning: शुल्लक अपराधाचा घडलेल्या मोठ्या अपराधाशी संबंध जोडणे.
cultural_translation: Linking a small crime to a bigger crime (judging someone as a big criminal because of a minor offence).

phrase: काळ आला होता पण वेळ आली नव्हती
literal_translation: The time had come, but the moment had not.
actual_meaning: नाश होण्याची वेळ आली होती पण र्ोडक्यात बचावणे.
cultural_translation: The danger had come, but escape was still possible (a narrow escape from disaster).

literal_translation: The cat is a witness to the mouse.
actual_meaning: सारख्याच लायकीच्या माणसाने एकमेकांचे समर्थन करणे.
cultural_translation: People of the same (wrong) kind supporting each other.

phrase: काडीची सत्ता आचण लाखाची मत्ता बरोबर होत नाही
literal_translation: A tiny bit of power is not equal to wealth worth millions.
actual_meaning: संपत्तीपेक्षा सत्ता महत्वाची ठरते. करंगळी सुजली म्हणून डोंगराएवढी होईल काय मुळातच लहान वस्तू दकतीही प्रयत्न केले तरी मयाथदेपेक्षा वाढत नाही.
cultural_translation: Power is considered more important than wealth, and a small thing can never become great no matter how much effort is made.

literal_translation: The wounds have healed, but the scars remain.
actual_meaning: वैभव गेले पण खणा मात्र राचहल्या
cultural_translation: The wealth is gone, but the show and pride still remain.

literal_translation: I will do whatever it takes.
actual_meaning: मी करीन तेच योग्य असे वागणे.
cultural_translation: Acting as if only what I do is right.

literal_translation: Counting the feathers of a flying bird
actual_meaning: अगदी सहज चालता चालता एखाद्या अवघड गोष्टीची परीक्षा करणे.
cultural_translation: Attempting a difficult task while it seems easy or casual.

actual_meaning: सगळेच सारखे
cultural_translation: All are the same / all are of the same kind.

literal_translation: You get up and sit down
actual_meaning: एकसारखा नेहमी मार देणे.
cultural_translation: Being beaten or troubled all the time (continuous harassment).

phrase: एकाची जळते दांडी दुसरा त्यावर पेटवू पाहतो चवडी
literal_translation: One person's stick is burning, and the other tries to light his own from it.
actual_meaning: दुसऱ्याचा अडचणीतही स्वतःचा फायदा पाहणे.
cultural_translation: Trying to take advantage of someone else’s trouble for one’s own benefit.

literal_translation: One or the other body is full of chachandhya
actual_meaning: सगळेच अपूणथ
cultural_translation: Nothing is done properly — everything is incomplete or messy.

phrase: एका म्यानात दोन तलवारी राहत नाही
literal_translation: Two swords cannot fit in one scabbard.
actual_meaning: दोन तेजस्वी माणसे एकत्र गुण्यागोचवंदाने नांदू शकत नाही.
cultural_translation: Two strong or dominant people cannot work or live peacefully together.

phrase: उस गोड लागला म्हणून मुळासकट खाऊ नये
literal_translation: Just because sugarcane tastes sweet, you shouldn't eat it along with the roots.
actual_meaning: कोणत्याही गोष्टीचा गैरफायदा घेऊ नये.
cultural_translation: Do not take unfair or excessive advantage of something just because it is good.

phrase: आडात नाही तर पोहऱ्यात कोठून येणार?
literal_translation: If there is nothing in the well, where will it come from in the bucket?
actual_meaning: जे मुळातच नाही त्याची र्ोडी देखील अपेक्षा करणे व्यर्थच.
cultural_translation: If something does not exist at the source, you cannot expect it anywhere else.

actual_meaning: गरजेपोटी दुसऱ्याचे चनमाटपणे सहन करणे.
cultural_translation: A needy person is forced to tolerate insults or unfair treatment.

phrase: गाढवाने शेत खाल्ले ना पाप ना पुण्य
literal_translation: The donkey ate the crop; neither sin nor merit.
actual_meaning: अयोग्य व्यक्तीला एखादी गोष्ट ददल्याने ती वायाच जाते.
cultural_translation: Giving something valuable to an unworthy person is a complete waste.

literal_translation: The more you rub coal, the blacker it gets.
actual_meaning: वाईट गोष्टीचा दकती उहापोह केला तरी ती वाईटच
cultural_translation: No matter how much you try to justify something bad, it remains bad.

literal_translation: The wet burns along with the dry.
actual_meaning: चनष्कारण चनरपराध्याची अपराध्यासोबत गणना करणे.
cultural_translation: An innocent person gets punished along with the guilty.

literal_translation: A torch in a monkey's hand
actual_meaning: चवध्वंसतोशी माणसाच्या हातात कारभार सोपचवणे.
cultural_translation: Giving responsibility or power to a foolish or destructive person.

literal_translation: The pipe's journey with the cart
actual_meaning: मोठ्यांच्या आश्रयाने लहानांचा देखील फायदा होतो.
cultural_translation: Small or less important people also benefit by being associated with powerful or important ones.

actual_meaning: आपले काम झाले की उपकारकत्याथची पवाथ न करणे.
cultural_translation: Once the need is over, people forget the one who helped them.

literal_translation: One should be extravagant with food by eating it, not by wasting it.
actual_meaning: पैशाचा , संपत्तीचा गैरवापर करू नये.
cultural_translation: One should be proud of what one earns or deserves, not of what is given or thrown to them.

literal_translation: He who knows how to eat also knows how to digest.
actual_meaning: एखादे कृत्य धाडसाने करणारा त्याचे पररणाम भोगण्यास समर्थ असणे.
cultural_translation: If you dare to do something, you must also be ready to face its consequences.

phrase: गाढवापुढे वाचली गीता कालचा गोंधळ बरा होता
literal_translation: Reading the Gita to a donkey; yesterday's chaos was better.
actual_meaning: मुखाथला दकतीही उपदेश केला तरी तो व्यर्थच ठरतो.
cultural_translation: Giving advice to a foolish person is completely useless.

literal_translation: The stone in the potter woman's house belongs to the potter woman.
actual_meaning: आपल्या ताब्यातील वस्तूवर आपलाच हक्क दाखचवणे.
cultural_translation: Claiming ownership over something simply because it is in one’s possession.

literal_translation: Making a mountain out of a molehill
actual_meaning: राईचा पवथत करणे.
cultural_translation: To make a big issue out of a very small matter (to exaggerate a problem).

actual_meaning: खरे कधी लपत नाही.
cultural_translation: Truth can never be hidden.

literal_translation: A sack of sugar on a donkey's back
actual_meaning: एखाद्या गोष्टीची अनुकुलता असुन चालत नाही तर सोबतच चतचा फायदा क्षमता असावी
cultural_translation: Giving something valuable to someone who cannot understand or make use of it.

literal_translation: What does a donkey know about the taste of jaggery?
actual_meaning: ज्याला एखाद्या गोष्टीचा गंध नाही त्याला त्याचे महत्व चनरर्थक असते.
cultural_translation: Something valuable has no meaning to a person who cannot understand its worth.

phrase: खायचे दात वेगळे व दाखवायचे दात वेगळे
literal_translation: Their eating teeth are different from their showing teeth.
actual_meaning: बोलताना एक बोलायचे आचण प्रत्यक्ष कृती वेगळीच करायची.
cultural_translation: To say one thing but do something completely different.

actual_meaning: खोट्यापणाने वाईट काम करणाऱ्या माणसाचे शेवटी नुकसान होते.
cultural_translation: A person who lies and does wrong will eventually face harm or disgrace.

actual_meaning: मुखाथला दकती समजावले तरी व्यर्थच.
cultural_translation: A person’s bad nature does not change, no matter how much you try to correct them.

literal_translation: Stealing a cucumber is punishable by death.
actual_meaning: अपराध लहान पण चशक्षा मोठी.
cultural_translation: A small offence receiving a very severe punishment.

literal_translation: Water does not split apart when struck with a stick.
actual_meaning: खरी मैत्री दकरकोळ कारणाने भंग होत नाही.
cultural_translation: True friendship does not break because of small or trivial reasons.

actual_meaning: र्ट्टेचा पररणाम दकत्येकदा भयंकर वाईट होतो
cultural_translation: Sometimes a joke turns into something serious and hurtful.

literal_translation: Cows do not die from a crow's curse.
actual_meaning: क्षुद्र माणसाच्या चनंदेने र्ोर माणसाचे काही नुकसान होत नाही.
cultural_translation: A great person is not harmed by the curse or criticism of petty people.

actual_meaning: भांडणाचा दोष एक पक्षाकडेच असत नाही.
cultural_translation: A conflict is never caused by only one side; both parties share the blame.

literal_translation: Listen to others, but do what your heart tells you.
actual_meaning: सवाांचा चवचार घ्यावा व आपणास योग्य वाटेल ते करावे.
cultural_translation: Listen to others’ opinions, but do what you feel is right.

literal_translation: Every house has a clay stove.
actual_meaning: सवथत्र सारखी परीचस्र्ती असणे.
cultural_translation: Every household faces similar situations or problems.

literal_translation: A thief's mind is full of moonlight.
actual_meaning: गुन्हा करणाऱ्याला अपराधी वाटणे.
cultural_translation: A guilty person feels fear and suspicion inside, even without being accused.

actual_meaning: छोट्या साठ्वचनतून मोठा संग्रह होतो.
cultural_translation: Little drops make a big collection.

literal_translation: A lizard's run is only as far as the fence.
actual_meaning: कमजोर माणसाचे काम मयाथददत असते
cultural_translation: A weak person’s ability is limited.

literal_translation: A big house with hollow beams.
actual_meaning: नाव मोठे पण लक्षण खोटे.
cultural_translation: Big name, but no real quality or substance.

literal_translation: A drowning man will clutch at a straw
actual_meaning: संकटात दुसऱ्याचे र्ोडे साह्म सुध्दा महत्त्वाचे वाटते.
cultural_translation: Even a very small help feels extremely valuable in times of trouble.

actual_meaning: पूणथ मोबदल्याऐवजी र्ोडासा का होईना मोबदला देणे
cultural_translation: If not the full thing, at least something (a small compensation instead of a proper one).

phrase: म्हातारीने कोंबडे झाकले तरी उजाडायचे राहत नाही
literal_translation: Even if the old woman covers the rooster, the dawn will still break.
actual_meaning: जी गोष्ट व्हायचीच असेल व ती होऊ नये म्हणून प्रयत्न केले तरी ती झाल्याचशवाय राहत नाही.
cultural_translation: What is meant to happen will happen, no matter how hard you try to stop it.

literal_translation: The fox is happy with the cucumber.
actual_meaning: क्षुद्र मनुष्य मामुली गोष्टीत खुश असतो.
cultural_translation: A petty-minded person is satisfied with small or trivial gains.

literal_translation: The king's behavior is like that of a rogue.
actual_meaning: श्रीमंतीचा आव आणायचा पण दाररद्र्यासारखे राहायचे.
cultural_translation: Showing off like a king, but living like a poor person.

literal_translation: A wise man's bull is never idle.
actual_meaning: वाजवीपेक्षा जास्त शहाणपणा नुकसानकारक ठरतो.
cultural_translation: Being over-smart or over-clever can be harmful and lead to loss.

literal_translation: Shallow waters make a lot of noise.
actual_meaning: अंगात र्ोडीशी कुवत असुन देखील जास्त ददमाख दाखवणे.
cultural_translation: People with little ability make the most noise (show off the most).

literal_translation: The washing fee is proportional to the amount of laundry.
actual_meaning: जसा पैसा द्याल तसे काम होईल.
cultural_translation: You get the quality of work according to the money you pay.

actual_meaning: मोठ्या माणसाच्या रठकाणीही उणीवा असतात.
cultural_translation: Even great or powerful people have flaws.

literal_translation: A penny for the offering, a lakh for the circumambulation.
actual_meaning: र्ोड्या मोबदल्यात जास्त काम करून घेणे.
cultural_translation: Getting a lot of work done for very little payment.

actual_meaning: स्वार्थ साधून घेऊन दुसऱ्याला मदत करणे.
cultural_translation: First satisfy your own needs, then think about helping others.

literal_translation: The blind woman grinds the grain, and the dog eats the flour.
actual_meaning: एकाच्या कामाचा दुसराच फायदा घेतो.
cultural_translation: One person does the work, but someone else enjoys the benefit.
